welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded! You might need to refresh to see all changes or if new collections were created.
login.descDefault: Log in to continue to Kratia Forums.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your account before logging in.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your user profile.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Issue with your profile after Google Sign-In (Reason: {{reason}}).
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
signup.title: Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Apply to become a member of our community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself and why you want to join Kratia Forums...
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Your presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not validly formatted.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill in your presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the terms before signing up with Google.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is currently sanctioned and cannot re-apply at this time.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during Google Sign-Up.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this Google email. Please log in.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: Please check your email to verify your account. After verification, log in to complete your admission process.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write a short presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the terms and conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: No worries! Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If an account with email {{email}} exists, a reset link has been sent.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.afterV: After verifying your email, you can
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation Page
confirmPage.default.description: Please follow the instructions provided or return to login.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.

agoraPage.error.loadFail: Failed to load Agora data. Please try again.

agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.underSa: You cannot propose new votations while under a sanction process.

proposeConstitution.error.notFound: Constitution document not found. Cannot propose changes.
proposeConstitution.error.loadFail: Failed to load current constitution text. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.title: Access Denied
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.descrip: You do not have permission to propose constitution changes. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeConstitution.toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to propose changes.
proposeConstitution.toast.noChanges.desc: The proposed constitution text is identical to the current one.
proposeConstitution.votationDescription: Proposal to change the site constitution. Justification: {{justification}}
proposeConstitution.toast.success.title: Constitution Change Proposed!
proposeConstitution.toast.success.descri: Votation for "{{proposalTitle}}" created in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.toast.error.descript: Failed to propose constitution change. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to modify the site's Norms and Conditions (Constitution). Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Update to Article 3 regarding Karma System
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain the reasons for the proposed changes and their expected impact.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the entire current constitution here and make your modifications. Clearly indicate what has changed if possible in your justification.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Modify the text below with your proposed changes. The current constitution is pre-filled.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposed text is complete and well-justified.

proposeNewForum.accessDenied.description: You do not have permission to propose new forums. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeNewForum.toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to propose a new forum.
proposeNewForum.votationDescription: Proposal to create a new forum "{{forumName}}" in category "{{categoryName}}". Justification: {{justification}}

proposeNewForum.toast.success.descriptio: The votation for "{{forumName}}" has been created in the Agora.
proposeNewForum.toast.error.description: Failed to propose new forum. Please try again.
proposeNewForum.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to create a new forum. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeNewForum.form.descriptionPlacehol: A brief description of what this new forum will be about.
proposeNewForum.form.categoryPlaceholder: Select a category for the new forum
proposeNewForum.form.publicLabel: Publicly visible (guests can view threads and posts)
proposeNewForum.form.justificationPlaceh: Explain why this new forum is needed and how it will benefit the community.
proposeNewForum.importantNotice.title: Important Notice
proposeNewForum.importantNotice.descript: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.

threadPage.votation.description: This thread is associated with a formal community votation.
threadPage.votation.yourSanctionProcessD: You cannot vote in your own sanction process. You can reply in this thread to present your defense.
threadPage.votation.notEligible.underSan: You cannot vote while under a sanction process (except in your own sanction thread, where you cannot vote).
threadPage.votation.notEligible.noVoting: You do not have voting rights.
threadPage.votation.votingClosedDesc: This votation is no longer active. Result:
threadPage.votation.outcome.failedQuorum: Failed - Quorum not met ({{votesCast}} of {{votesRequired}} required).
threadPage.votation.outcome.failedVote: Failed - Proposal did not pass vote.
threadPage.noPostsYet: No posts in this thread yet.
threadPage.threadLockedNoReplies: This thread is locked, so no new replies can be added.
threadPage.cannotReply.underSanctionOthe: You can only reply in your own sanction votation thread while your case is active.
threadPage.cannotReply.sanctioned: You are currently sanctioned and cannot reply.

threadPage.threadLockedDesc: This thread has been locked by an administrator or has concluded. No new replies can be added.

threadPage.toast.toggleLock.agoraLockedD: Agora threads are automatically locked after votation conclusion and cannot be manually unlocked if the votation is closed.
threadPage.toast.toggleLock.lockedDesc: This thread is now locked. No new replies can be added.
threadPage.toast.toggleLock.error: Failed to toggle thread lock state.

threadPage.toast.toggleSticky.error: Failed to toggle thread sticky state.

proposeSanction.accessDenied.generic: You do not have permission to propose sanctions. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.

proposeSanction.accessDenied.title: Access Denied

proposeSanction.initialPostContent:
Proposal to sanction user **{{username}}** for a duration of **{{duration}}**.

**Justification:**
{{justification}}

This proposal is now subject to community votation in the Agora.
proposeSanction.votationDescription: Community vote to sanction user {{username}} for {{duration}}.
proposeSanction.toast.successDesc: Votation to sanction {{username}} created in the Agora.
proposeSanction.toast.errorDesc: Failed to propose sanction. Please try again.
proposeSanction.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to sanction a user. This will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeSanction.form.justificationPlaceh: Clearly explain the reasons for the proposed sanction, citing specific rule violations or problematic behavior if applicable.
proposeSanction.importantNotice.title: Important Notice
proposeSanction.importantNotice.descript: Proposing a sanction is a serious action. Ensure your justification is clear and fair. User {{username}} will be notified and can defend themselves in the votation thread.
